summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Todo List application with Google OAuth authentication. Backend APIs working perfectly (8/8 tests passed). Frontend functionality mostly working with excellent user isolation and CRUD operations. Minor UI interaction issues with dropdown filters in automated testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown option selection has interaction issues in automated testing - elements not clickable
Priority selection dropdown options not clickable in automated testing

passed_tests: Landing page loading with vibrant design
User isolation (users only see their own tasks)
action_item_for_main_agent: The dropdown interaction issues may be testing-specific rather than real user issues. Consider manual testing of filter dropdowns to verify if they work correctly for actual users. All core functionality is working well.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (minor dropdown interaction issues in automated testing)
